mapper.insert:
insert into damage_type
damage_type.damage_desc,
damage_type.damage_no,
damage_type.damage_type,
damage_type.is_delete,
damage_type.operator,
damage_type.sort_num,
damage_type.status,
damage_type.create_time
values
#{damageDesc},
#{damageNo},
#{damageType},
#{isDelete},
#{operator},
#{sortNum},
#{status},
current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update damage_type
damage_type.damage_desc = #{DamageDesc},
damage_type.damage_no = #{DamageNo},
damage_type.damage_type = #{DamageType},
damage_type.is_delete = #{IsDelete},
damage_type.operator = #{Operator},
damage_type.sort_num = #{SortNum},
damage_type.status = #{Status}
damage_type.update_time= current_timestamp
damage_type.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select damage_type.create_time, damage_type.damage_desc, damage_type.damage_no, damage_type.damage_type, damage_type.id, damage_type.is_delete, damage_type.operator, damage_type.sort_num, damage_type.status, damage_type.update_time form damage_type
damage_type.id = #{id}
